thread.section_title: Archive News & Video for Wednesday, 21 Feb 2018 | Reuters.com
thread.title: BRIEF-SAP Raises Dividend Policy To 40 Pct Or More Of Profit After Tax ​

author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-SAP Raises Dividend Policy To 40 Pct Or More Of Profit After Tax ​
text:
Feb 21 (Reuters) - SAP SE:
* SAP RAISES DIVIDEND POLICY TO 40% OR MORE OF PROFIT AFTER TAX; RECOMMENDS A DIVIDEND OF €1.40 PER SHARE
* ‍HAS INCREASED DIVIDEND POLICY TO 40% OR MORE OF PROFIT AFTER TAX (PREVIOUSLY MORE THAN 35%)​
* ‍IF SHAREHOLDERS APPROVE THE RECOMMENDATION, TOTAL AMOUNT OF DIVIDENDS TO BE DISTRIBUTED WILL BE ABOUT EUR 1.67 BILLION (2016: EUR 1.5 BILLION)​ Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
